mapper.select: SELECT TMPLAT_ID AS tmplatId, TMPLAT_NM AS tmplatNm, TMPLAT_SE_CODE AS tmplatSeCode, TMPLAT_COURS AS tmplatCours, USE_AT AS useAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm FROM CMS_TEMPLATE WHERE TMPLAT_ID = #{tmplatId}

SELECT TMPLAT_ID AS tmplatId, TMPLAT_NM AS tmplatNm, TMPLAT_SE_CODE AS tmplatSeCode, TMPLAT_COURS AS tmplatCours, USE_AT AS useAt, FRST_REGIST_PNTTM AS frstRegistPnttm FROM CMS_TEMPLATE
AND TMPLAT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%', #{tmplatNm}, '%')
AND USE_AT = #{useAt}
ORDER BY FRST_REGIST_PNTTM DESC
